name: Wookiee Brew
description: A hearty ale brewed by Wookiees on Kashyyyk.

name: Tatooine Sunset Lager
description: A refreshing lager with a hint of desert spice.

name: Sith Stout
description: A dark and sinister stout with a strong kick.

name: Ewok Elixir
description: An enchanting elixir brewed by the Ewoks of Endor.

name: Alderaan Amber Ale
description: A smooth amber ale from the now-destroyed planet of Alderaan.

name: Hutt Hops IPA
description: An intensely hoppy IPA with a hint of Hutt spice.

name: Droid's Delight Pilsner
description: A crisp and refreshing pilsner for droids and humans alike.

name: Womp Rat Wheat Beer
description: A light and wheaty beer inspired by Tatooine's native creatures.

name: Rebel Red Ale
description: A bold and rebellious red ale for those who fight the Empire.

name: Force Field Porter
description: A robust porter with a protective Force field of flavor.

name: Yoda's Wisdom Saison
description: A saison brewed with the wisdom of Master Yoda.

name: Eternal Empire ESB
description: An Extra Special Bitter favored by the Eternal Empire's soldiers.

name: Alderaanian Cider
description: A crisp and fruity cider from the lush world of Alderaan.

name: Dagobah Dark Lager
description: A mysterious and dark lager with flavors of Dagobah's swamp.

name: Mandalorian Malt Whiskey
description: A strong malt whiskey for those with Mandalorian strength.

name: Jedi Juice
description: A fruity and refreshing juice blend with Jedi-like balance.

name: Sarlacc Sour
description: A tart and sour brew inspired by the Sarlacc pit.

name: Hoth Hefeweizen
description: A cloudy hefeweizen with a hint of Hoth's icy chill.

name: Alderaan Stout
description: A rich and bold stout from the heart of Alderaan.

name: Chewbacca's Chewy Caramel Ale
description: A caramel-infused ale inspired by the legendary Wookiee.
